verses.content: “Bezalel le Oholiab le mi themthiem tukhawm, Hmun Inthieng bâwlnaa sin po pohai thaw dân hre dinga an lungrila LALPAIN thiemna le varna a sienahai taphawt chun LALPAIN thu a pêk po po ang tak chun thâwng an tih,” a tih a.
Mosie chun Bezalel, Oholiab le mi themthiem LALPAIN an lungrila thiemna a pêkhai, chu sin thaw dinga an lungrila phûr takhai phawt chu, sin chu thaw dingin a ko a.

Anni chun Israel thlahaiin Hmun Inthieng bâwlnaa hmang dinga nuomthua thilpêk an hung chawihai po po chu Mosie kuoma inthawkin an lâk a. Zîng tinin ama kuoma chun mâni nuomthua thilpêk chu an la hung chawi zing a.
Chun, mi themthiem Hmun In- thienga sinthawtuhai po po chu, mi tin chu an sinthawna senga in- thawkin, an hung a,
Mosie kuoma chun, “LALPAIN siem dinga thu a pêk, hi sin thawnaa hmang ding hin a huntâwk nêka tam lem mipuiin an hung lâk tah,” an tih a.

Chuongchun, Mosie chun, “Pasal khawmin, nuhmei khawmin Hmun Inthienga dinga thilpêk dang hrim pe ta naw raw hai se,” tiin thu a pêk a, chu thu chu riebûk po poa puong a ni tah a. Chuongchun, mipui chu an hung pêk khap an ni tah a:
Hmangruo an nei chu sin po poa hmang ding chun a huntâwk tah a, a tam taluo rau ta leiin.
Anni laia sinthawtu mi them- thiemhai po po chun biekbûk chu puonzâr sâwm, puon zai inhmi kawp le, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, le a seninlâr, cherubhai lim kutthiemtaka chei chun an siem tah a.
Puonzâr tin seitieng chu tawng sâwmhni pariet, puonzâr tin lien- tieng chu tawng li a nih a, puonzâr po po chu ân tie vawng a nih.
Chun, puonzâr panga chu a ṭhui zawm a, puonzâr panga dang chu a ṭhuizawm bawk a.
Puonzâr pakhat a thuo laia kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valbahai dumpâwlin a siem a, chuong ang bawk chun a thuo hninaa puon- zâr puo tak tlânga chun a siem bawk a.
Puonzâr pakhata chun valba sâwmnga a siem a, a thuo hninaa puonzâr pakhat tlânga chun valba sâwmnga bawk a siem a; valbahai chu an inzawm seng bawk a.
Chun, rângkachak puonchepna sâwmnga a siem a, chuong puon- chepnahai chun puonzârhai chu an cheptuoh a: chuongchun, biekbûk chu pakhat a hung ni tah a.
Biekbûka puon in inkhumna ding chun kêl hmul puonzârhai a siem a, puonzâr chu sâwm le pakhat a siem a.
Puonzâr tin seitieng chu tawng sâwmthum, puonzâr tin lientieng chu tawng li a nih; puonzâr sâwm le pakhat chu an intie seng a.
Puonzâr panga chu a ṭhui zawm a, puonzâr paruk chu a ṭhui zawm bawk a.
Puonzâr hmasa a kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valba sâwmnga a siem a, a thuo hninaa puonzâr kâwl- hnung tak tlânga chun valba sâwmnga bawk a siem a.
Puon in chu pindan pakhat a ni theina dinga chep khâwmna ding- in dârsen puonchepna sâwmnga a siem a.
Chu puon in inkhumna ding chu berâmchal vun suksenin le chu chung nâwka chun seal vunhaiin inkhumna a siem a.
Chun, biekbûk bang intunghai chu shittim thingin a siem a.
Thingphêk tin seitieng chu tawng sâwm, thingphêk tin lientieng chu tawng khat le a chenve a nih.
Thingphêk tin chun rek pahni, a dang le thun zawmna ding a nei seng a; biekbûk thingphêk po po chu chuong ang seng chun a siem vawng a.
Biekbûka thingphêkhai chu chuong ang chun a siem a, sim- sawngah thingphêk sâwmhni,

chun, thingphêk sâwmhni hnuoia chun tangkaruo kerkuok sâwmli, thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah a rek pahni inṭhutna dingin kerkuok pahni pei; chun, thingphêk dang hnuoia khawm a rek pahni in ṭhut- na ding kerkuok pahni pei bawk a siem a.
Chun, biekbûk sîr hnina, a hmartieng panga chun, thingphêk sâwmhni le,
an inṭhutna ding tangkaruo kerkuok sâwmli a siem a; thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah kerkuok pahni, thingphêk dang hnuoiah kerkuok pahni bawk.
Biekbûk châwrtieng thlang- tieng panga chun thingphêk paruk a siem a.
Biekbûk châwrtieng kihaia dingin thingphêk pahni a siem a.
Chun, a hnuoitieng chun suk- tuok an nih a, a chungtieng ruok chun a sîpah, kuol pakhata chel khâwm an nih a, a kihai pahnia mi chu chuong ang ve ve chun a thawh a.
Chuongchun, thingphêk pariet an inṭhutna tangkaruo seng leh; ker- kuok sâwmparuk, thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah kerkuok pahni peiin a um a.
Chun, shittim thing bangru- hai a siem a, biekbûk sîr khata thingphêkhai dingin bangru panga,
biekbûk sîr khingtienga thing- phêkhai dingin bangru panga bawk, biekbûk châwrtieng thlangtieng panga thingphêkhai dingin bangru panga.
A bangru lailung tak chu a thingphêkhai sûngah a tâwp taka inthawka khingtieng tâwp tak chena rawl thlengin a siem a.
Thingphêkhai chu rângkachak- in ân luon khum a; chun, a bangruhai rawlna dingin rângkachak kuolhai a siem a, bangruhai chu rângkachakin ân luon khum bawk a.
Chun, puonzâr sahmul dum- pâwl, a êm le a seninlâr le, pat zai inhmi kawpin, cherubhai lim kut- thiemtaka siemhaia cheiin a siem a.
Chu khaina ding chun shittim thing ban pali a siem a, rângkachakin ân luon khum a; an kuoikimhai chu rângkachak a nih a, an inṭhutna dingin tangkaraw kerkuok pali a sut bawk a.
Puon in kawtkhâra ding chun puonzâr, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le puonzai inhmi kawp, a ṭhuia ṭhuimawia chei chu a siem a;
a ban panga le a kuoikimhai leh. An lubâwkhai le an tuom mawinahai chu rângkachak ân luon khum a, an inṭhutna panga ruok chu dârsen an nih.
